title: Retry redeploy (build + deploy) with no functional changes
constraints: Redeploy the current backend and frontend to the Internet Computer without introducing functional changes.
Follow the existing redeployment checklist in frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md after deployment (manual smoke test of public and admin routes).
Use English for any user-facing text (no new non-English messages introduced as part of this redeploy request).
nonGoals: Do not implement new features or refactors as part of this request.
Do not modify public or admin UI/UX, routing, storage keys, or backend method signatures as part of this request.
